name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sift: IMDB ratings on various OTT plaftorms. Free & Open Source.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sift adds IMDB ratings next to programs on various OTT platforms to help you choose what to watch faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension:
- adds the IMDB rating of a movie / tv show next to it's tile on the page
- clicking on the rating opens the movie's IMDB page in a new tab
- is free & open-source; source code: https://github.com/ackinc/webext-movie-ratings

The list of supported OTT platforms includes Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, AppleTV+, and  the major Indian OTTs. Full list here: https://github.com/ackinc/webext-movie-ratings/blob/master/README.md

The IMDB ratings come from the free OMDB API, maintained by Brian Fritz. If you're enjoying using the extension, please consider donating to his Patreon to keep the service going! https://www.patreon.com/join/omdb
